messages.subject: email abbreviations was :Unschoolers and college
messages.msgSnippet: ... The d is for dear or damn, depending on the poster s mood. ;-)
messages.messageBody:
>>would anyone feel like informing me on some abbreviations? I've been
>>reading posts for many months now and still don't know what the d stands
>>for in dh, dd, ds, and don't know alot of other abbreviations. Thanks to
>>anyone who has the time to explain these to me.>>


The d is for dear or damn, depending on the poster's mood. ;-) <= that's a
wink, LOL is laugh out loud, <g> is grin, <eg> evil grin, <veg> very evil
grin, etc. ROFL is rolling on the floor laughing, ROFLMAO is rolling on the
floor laughing my ass off, KWIM is know what I mean, YK is you know.

That's all I can think of right now. I know there are pages of them.

Life is good.
~Mary
